colorTheory.description: This color palette combines a cool primary color with a warm accent color for visual interest and contrast.
colorTheory.mood: The colors convey a professional and trustworthy feel while maintaining visual appeal.
colorTheory.accessibility: The high contrast between text and background colors ensures readability and accessibility.
colorTheory.colorRelationships: The primary and secondary colors create a clean and modern look, with the accent color adding vibrancy and energy.
